title: George.Carlin.Its.Bad.for.Ya.HDTV.Subtitulado.Esp.SC.avi
description:
It's Bad for Ya! is the final HBO stand-up comedy special by stand-up comedian George Carlin. It was televised live on March 1, 2008 on HBO, less than four months before he died of heart failure at age 71.
